channel.title: Unknown Soruce
channel.description:
Hello.
Most people are getting this problem as well but different ways tho.. When i try to run.bat the Client so i can use Custom stuff i get this..
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: EGUI. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Could anyone tell me what i need to do to get it working 100%?? (i'll rep++ if it works) Plus this is a RichScape Client.
PM back thank you!

item.title: Unknown Soruce
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:4, topic:268623”]People need to start reading their errors/exceptions before they come here.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI

Put the bold together and what do you get?

No class found: EGUI. Basically it is telling you the EGUI class isn’t found. Also, the client class has a ‘main’ method in it also ;)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Unknown Soruce
item.dc:creator: @lordante lordante
item.description:
@lordante wrote:

Hello.

Most people are getting this problem as well but different ways tho…
When i try to run.bat the Client so i can use Custom stuff i get this…
